diff_hunk:
@@ -61,7 +61,7 @@ fi
 WERROR=1 python setup.py install
 
 # Add the test binaries so that they won't be git clean'ed away
-git add -f build/bin
+git add -f build/bin build/lib
body: Wait, why do you need this directory? On my build it weighs 700M, a good 30% of the overall 2.6G that's the build directory. And if we installed PyTorch, we should already have these libraries skulking around elsewhere. Is the rpath not working or something?
